21 #include "encryption.h"
22 #include "xpath_wrangler.h"
23 
24 EPUB3_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
25 
26 // Added by T.H. Kim on 2015-04-15
27 #define ReadiumURI "http://readium.org/2015/01/lcp#extendedProperty"
28 
29 bool EncryptionInfo::ParseXML(shared_ptr<xml::Node> node)
30 {
31  // Modified by T.H. Kim on 2015-04-15
32  // To add ReadiumURI namespace to process the addition information
33 
34 #if EPUB_COMPILER_SUPPORTS(CXX_INITIALIZER_LISTS)
35  XPathWrangler xpath(node->Document(), {{"enc", XMLENCNamespaceURI}, {"dsig", XMLDSigNamespaceURI} , {"ds", XMLDSigNamespaceURI}, { "ep", ReadiumURI }});
36 #else
37  XPathWrangler::NamespaceList nsList;
38  nsList["enc"] = XMLENCNamespaceURI;
39  nsList["dsig"] = XMLDSigNamespaceURI;
40  nsList["ds"] = XMLDSigNamespaceURI;
41  nsList["ep"] = ReadiumURI;
42  XPathWrangler xpath(node->doc, nsList);
43 #endif
44 
45  auto strings = xpath.Strings("./enc:EncryptionMethod/@Algorithm", node);
46  if ( strings.empty() )
47  return false;
48 
49  _algorithm = strings[0];
50 
51  // This is used for LCP detection
52  // @see https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oNfXQZRSGqwpexLrhw0-0a2taEvVDXS9cPs8oBKLb0U/edit#bookmark=id.fdwd1ub4whd8
53  strings = xpath.Strings("./ds:KeyInfo/ds:RetrievalMethod/@Type", node);
54  if ( !strings.empty() ) {
55  _keyRetrievalMethodType = strings[0];
56  }
57 
58  strings = xpath.Strings("./enc:CipherData/enc:CipherReference/@URI", node);
59  if ( strings.empty() )
60  return false;
61 
62  _path = strings[0];
63 
64  // Added by DRM inside, T.H. Kim on 2015-04-15
65  // To get additional information for the compressed and encrypted contents
66  strings = xpath.Strings("./enc:EncryptionProperties/enc:EncryptionProperty/ep:compression/@method", node);
67  if (!strings.empty())
68  {
69  if (strings[0] == "0" || strings[0] == "8")
70  _compression_method = strings[0];
71  else
72  return false;
73 
74  }
75  else if (strings.empty())
76  _compression_method = "0";
77 
78  strings = xpath.Strings("./enc:EncryptionProperties/enc:EncryptionProperty/ep:compression/@sourceSize", node);
79  if (!strings.empty())
80  {
81  for ( int i = 0 ; i < strings[0].size() ; i++)
82  if (strings[0][i] < '0' || strings[0][i] > '9' )
83  return false;
84 
85  _uncompressed_size = strings[0];
86  }
88 
89  return true;
90 }
91
